models.monsters

Class Beholder

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.monsters.base.Monster
      • models.monsters.Beholder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Droppable

    public final class Beholder
extends Monster
implements Droppable

    Beholder Model Object

    Extends the Monster Object and Implements the Droppable interface.

    it is a Beholder Monster with a low normal attack but,

    a very high Special attack.

    Since:
    November 24, 2017
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Andres Hermilo Carrera
